name: The Legend Of Santa (Ominouss)
description:
READ THE README FOR CONTROLS AND TO KNOW MORE ABOUT THE PROJECT. Altf4 once u get the star in the cave(only one possible to get). The game was meant to be a Metroidvania but we wanted to make 2 different areas with 2 different scenery which was really dumb since the assets for the cave area took way too long and I underestimated the amount of assets I'd need.

Broken Things:

  • Main menu in cave
  • No death plane in cave
  • Can't leave cave
  • Shooting light(e)
  • Can't reach 1 star(you will know which one)

If me and my partner could work on this on the final day it would be a lot more polished. We really overestimated our potential in the time frame due to having nearly no gamedev experience. URP also bugged so it took 2hrs of time to fix.

P.S You can dash jump double jump then dash again off a platform.

Thanks to everyone who played this game. It was a hellish few days.
